description: This is a test suite for the 'RemotionTemplate' in the 'universalinit' project, utilizing pytest fixtures and test functions to verify project initialization, configuration loading, template variable replacement, and post-processing script execution.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and template files.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a mock project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_remotion_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the template's initial information can be retrieved correctly.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Checks that the post-processing script executes and creates a marker file.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Verifies loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables in files are correctly replaced with project data.
